topics.body:
Here's my personal opinion on the latest super hero movies:
Avengers is *WAY* better cause during Superman's movie Superman caused the equivalent of 100 9/11's; whereas in Avengers 1 the majority of the avengers were working on damage control and evacuating civilians.

Avengers 1 >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Superman

The new superman is just a excuse to blow shit up.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a2e59a6368721335000de5#post_55a2e59a6368721335000de5
i dont hate the show but it pisses me off when people consider it a deconstruction considering how all it did was take the original tropes of magical girl shows and make them 1000x times darker which is not a deconstruction. and even disregarding that, Sailor Moon killed off half of their characters, Revolutionary Girl Utena had a death scene in it and Princess Tutu ive heard is pretty macabre in some parts, introducing darker concepts is not a unique idea for the magical girl genre.

i still need to watch madoka
It looks kinda fucked up

topics.body:
"@MoogSourceVermona":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a2e57963687237f400027f#post_55a2e57963687237f400027f
[spoiler]Eh; I'd say it was a deconstruction because the twist when you get down to it is that incredibly advance aliens are tricking girls into believing magic is real to harvest them for energy.  When you think about it in madoka magica there isn't even such a thing as magic; just a incredibly advance race of aliens metaphorically fucking with humans into willingly letting themselves be farmed like cattle.[/spoiler]

!http://izquotes.com/quotes-pictures/quote-any-sufficiently-advanced-technology-is-indistinguishable-from-magic-arthur-c-clarke-38011.jpg!
